com.pump.plaf

Class SourceListUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.ListUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicListUI
          • com.pump.plaf.SourceListUI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AquaSourceListUI

    public abstract class SourceListUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicListUI
    This abstract ListUI offers subclasses the chance to customize how the rectangle behind the selected cell is rendered. This was originally intended for "Source List" components in file dialogs.

    If this UI is being used, it is important to use a ListCellRenderer that is not opaque. If it is opaque then it will cover the background rendered by paintBackground.
